name: MANHASSET BAY ONE-DESIGN

images.alt: Manhasset Bay One-Design photo on sailboatdata.com
Mahhasset Bay One-Design drawing on sailboatdata.com

notes:
A design selected for junior sailors (by Junior Yacht Racing Assoc. of Long Island Sound), this is said to be the first commission for the firm of Sparkman & Stephens and hence, listed by them as S&S design #1.
An active fleet still exists at Manhasset Bay Y.C.USA (2013).
